assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: This is an introductory course of algebra. The following topics are considered: 1) matrices, operations with matrices; 2) determinant of a matrix, Laplace theorem, reciprocal matrix; 3) vector space over the field of real numbers, subspace, basis, coordinates of a vector; 4) linear system of equations and their solutions Gauss-Jordan elimination, Cramer's rule; 5) complex numbers, operations with them.
description.et: Algebra sissejuhatav kursus, milles käsitletakse järgmisi teemasid: 1) maatriksid, tehted maatriksitega, tehete omadused; 2) determinandid, tema omadused, Laplace`i teoreem, teoreem maatriksite korrutise determinandist, pöördmaatriks; 3) vektorruum üle reaalarvude, alamruum, baas ja koordinaadid; 4) lineaarvõrrandsüsteemid, nende lahendamine Gaussi meetodiga, Crameri reegel; 5) kompleksarvud, tehted nendega.

objectives.en: This course gives basic knowledge in linear algebra. The student develops learning skills related to numbers and calculation throughout the topics and exercise types covered in the course.
objectives.et: See kursus annab algteadmised lineaaralgebrast. Õppija arendab arvude ja arvutamisega seotud õpioskusi õpitavate teemade ja ülesandetüüpide lõikes.

learning_outcomes.en: After passing this course every student:
1. knows the properties of matrices and determinants and is able to formulate and prove them;
learning_outcomes.et: 1. teab maatriksite ja determinantide omadusi, oskab neid sõnastada ja tõestada;

learning_outcomes.en: 2. is able to calculate the inverse matrix;
3. knows what is a vector space and is able to give examples of vector spaces, to formulate and prove main properties of vector space;
learning_outcomes.et: 3. teab, mis on vektorruum (üle reaalarvude), oskab tuua näiteid ning sõnastada ja tõestada põhiomadusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 4. knows the Gauss' method and Cramer's rule for solving systems of linear equations and is able to use these for solving noncomplicated problems;
learning_outcomes.et: 4. tunneb Gaussi meetodit ja Crameri peajuhtu ja oskab neid vajadusel lihtsamate ülesannete korral kasutada;

learning_outcomes.en: 5. knows complex numbers, their algebraic, geometric and trigonometric form, is able to carry out arithmetic operations (addition, multiplication, division) with them;
learning_outcomes.et: 5. teab, mis on kompleksarv, selle algebraline, geomeetriline, trigonomeetriline kuju, oskab teostada aritmeetikatehteid (liitmine, korrutamine, jagamine) kompleksarvudega;

learning_outcomes.en: 6. chooses suitable mathematical conceptions (formulae) for problems, and applies these conceptions while solving problems.
learning_outcomes.et: 6. valib ülesannete lahendamiseks sobivad matemaatilised kontseptsioonid (valemid) ning rakendab neid ülesannete lahendamisel.
